markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monkey Pin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=226)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Climb</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are trained in Athletics
</row>

</column>

---

This small brass pin is in the shape of a monkey climbing a tree. When you activate this talisman, use a Climb action. If you succeed, you move your full Speed during the Climb. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Monkey Pin

text: <title level="1" right="Item 2" pfs="Standard" > Monkey Pin Source Core Rulebook pg. 568 4.0 Price 6 gp Usage affixed to armor Activate Single Action Climb Requirement You are trained in Athletics --- This small brass pin is in the shape of a monkey climbing a tree. When you activate this talisman, use a Climb action. If you succeed, you move your full Speed during the Climb. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.
